value.0: You have reached level 10 in MageBreaker! You can now pick 4 Spell schools to specialize against. (Gaining Immunity to Spells in those schools under level 5)
Here are your options. When you're done, select [No More Options].
You'll gain +4 to your saves against Transmutation, Are you sure?
You'll gain +4 to your saves against Illusion, Are you sure?
You'll gain +4 to your saves against Necromancy, Are you sure?
You'll gain +4 to your saves against Evocation. Are you sure?
You'll gain +4 to your saves against Enchantment. Are you sure?
You'll gain +4 to your saves against Divination. Are you sure?
You'll gain +4 to your saves against Conjuration. Are you sure?
You'll gain Immunity to level 5 and below spells in Abjuration. Are you sure?
